name: Ondel ondel run
description:
happens when there is a raid by the PP Satpol you will control the ondel-ondel to run from the PP security guard and avoid obstacles so that you don't get caught by the PP Satpol officer and collect change on the way.

How To Play

Swipe Left or Right for Change Route

Swipe Up for Jump

bgm by AA production

Listen to Ondel - Ondel Instrumental Karaoke Minusone by AA production on #SoundCloud

https://soundcloud.app.goo.gl/9sK87

ay.
